ai-tha-ap167:0.3_0: Hearing the song of the senior monks
ai-tha-ap167:1.1_0: “The Buddha of his name is the Awakened One
ai-tha-ap167:1.2_0: world’s Elder, unskilled in the world,
ai-tha-ap167:1.4_0: that’s how I plunged into the Great Wood.
ai-tha-ap167:3.1_0: The lie down on the same sheet
ai-tha-ap167:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap167:4.1_0: When twenty-four items have been brought,
ai-tha-ap167:4.2_0: Soṇa, the aristocrats of the brahmins,
ai-tha-ap167:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap167:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kaṇṭaka.
